entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher who has been assigned to the class. She is described as having her hands clasped neatly in front of her.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an organization that approves curricula for teaching defensive magic. It is mentioned as a source of authority and standardization.

entities.name: ow.l.
entities.description: O.W.L. stands for Ordinary Wizarding Level, which is an exam taken by students in their fifth year. It is mentioned as a benchmark for measuring student performance.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge's course is approved by the Ministry, indicating that it follows their curriculum standards.
The class is targeted for improvement in preparation for the O.W.L. exam, which suggests that Professor Umbridge's course is designed to help students meet this goal.
